column5: **We are just starting out on AirBnB so our price reflects the desire to gain momentum and reviews**  Private Family Friendly Master Suite with Patio. We are located less than 2 miles from Irving's downtown Heritage Center with its quaint boutiques, local restaurants, historical buildings, modern library, and walking park. We are also within driving distance (less than 12 miles) of the \
column8: Family Friendly Room near Rangers, Six Flags, ETC!
